ticket.title: default_url_options won't be called if no options provided for an URL
ticket.original-body:
in my ApplicationController I have the following code:
@@@ ruby protected def default_url_options( options=nil ) { :foo => 'bar' } end @@@
in my view:
@@@ erb <%= link_to('root', root_path) %> @@@
the generated URL will be in this case '/' instead of '/?foo=bar'
but if I add this to my view:
@@@ erb <%= link_to('root', root_path({})) %> @@@
it'll work in Rails 2.3.8.
